A plurality of respondents reported getting seven hours of sleep a night on average.

The majority of respondents to the poll — 83.7% — have not tested positive for COVID-19 in the past six months. In fall 2022, over two-thirds of respondents reported being “not” or “slightly” concerned about the spread of COVID-19 on campus, which represented a slight decrease in COVID-19 concern from spring 2022.

The NDR has taken place each semester for decades and is one of several nudity-related events and traditions on campus.

The proportion of female respondents who said they have participated in the Naked Donut Run — 3.2% — is over double the proportion of male respondents who said the same.
